active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Pair students to explain envelope encryption to a partner using a simple analogy (e.g., a locked box inside a safe containing the data encryption key), then switch roles and quiz each other on key management implications.
active_learning.problem_solving: Scenario: A company's database was breached, exposing patient records. Design an encryption strategy covering data at rest, in transit, and in use. Justify choices with best practices (AES-256, HSMs, key rotation) and standards (ISO 27001, GDPR).

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
